QuestData.Title: Wrathshard
QuestData.Description: The Underking has used the Hammer of Khaz'goroth to render the mountainside into a weapon against us. The hammer is a tool for creation, not a weapon for his amusement!$b$bEven now, his crystal servant, Wrathshard, is driving these elementals out of the mountain down upon my people.$b$bWe must hold the bridge against this onslaught.$b$bEnter the cave, find Wrathshard, and send him back to his master in pieces.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Summoned by the drogbar to destroy Thunder Totem.
QuestData.CompletionText: Dargrul always was a vile creature. I never realized to what extent until he got his hands on that hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: I suspect this is not the last of Dargrul's assaults. He is still learning the powers of the Hammer like a child with a new toy.
